title: Telia router - Random Disconnection
body:
After 3 weeks of random "attempting to reconnect".
I just try to tracert to RIOT server and found my client cant connect to Telia.
Anyone uses his router got similar issue ?

Tracert tool: http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/
Riot host: 192.64.170.1
When you disconnection, run this software to know where your connection stuck at.

replies.body:
The host IP to test with tracers on NA is actually **104.160.131.1**. I'd definitely recommend reaching out to your ISP if your connection is running into issues along the way. If you'd like, you can also drop your traceroute results in a reply so I can look at them.

Let me know if you have any questions.

What is NA server ip that i get from this page ? O.o
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs
